elements.name: supplyChainManagementEnvironmentURL
elements.label: Supply Chain Management environment URL
elements.toolTip: URL of the target Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management environment (example: https://contoso-uat.sandbox.operations.dynamics.com/)

elements.name: startMachineReportingStatusJob
elements.label: Start 'Machine reporting status' scenario job
elements.toolTip: Check to enable a Azure Stream Analytics job for the scenario. Keep unchecked if the scenario is not needed to avoid incurring any costs.

elements.name: startAssetMaintenanceJob
elements.label: Start 'Asset maintenance' scenario job
elements.toolTip: Check to enable a Azure Stream Analytics job for the scenario. Keep unchecked if the scenario is not needed to avoid incurring any costs.

elements.name: startProductQualityValidationJob
elements.label: Start 'Product quality validation' scenario job
elements.toolTip: Check to enable a Azure Stream Analytics job for the scenario. Keep unchecked if the scenario is not needed to avoid incurring any costs.

elements.name: existingIotHubSelector
elements.label: Existing Azure IoT Hub
elements.toolTip: Select an existing Azure IoT Hub to reuse (for instance, if one is available from a previous CFS deployment).
